text: Abrosovo () is a rural locality (a village) in Kromskoye Rural Settlement of Verkhnelandekhovsky District, Ivanovo Oblast, Russia. The population was 14 as of 2010. == Geography == The village is located 7.5 km from Verkhny Landekh. == References == Category:Rural localities in Ivanovo Oblast
title: Abrosovo, Ivanovo Oblast
